products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The one thing that we love about trinity blackout light grey is that it allows you to lose yourself in the moment the instant you set eyes on it. Take one look at the finely woven fabric and you get a sense of the regal calm you could add to your decor. We love the idea of hanging light grey against some pale magnolia walls, and above a light pine effect laminate floor. That way you can celebrate the way in which these neutral shades compliment one another as you sit back and take it all in.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) black smoke is a colour that you perhaps don't expect to find all that often, but it's certainly a welcome surprise when you find it staring right back at you. The beauty of the washed blue is that it clearly sits atop a foundation of light grey that gives it a natural stone-like quality. This is a fabric that has 'versatility' as its middle name, so why not embrace the new creative avenues that it opens? It's all about allowing your individuality to run free so that you can really put your own stamp on things.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Platinum - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, trinity blackout platinum combines the perfect night's sleep with the touch of luxury that no home should be without. The striking colour catches the eye from all angles, and is the perfect addition to the contemporary home in search of a subtle tweak. If you want to be able to create the relaxing little haven that will allow you to drift off to sleep the moment your head hits the pillow, platinum makes it happen.

products.title: Konya Blackout Ink Blue
products.description: Konya blackoutink blue plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. This light-grey, marbled, stone grey blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens.
